name: McKesson Corporation
summary: McKesson Corporation is a leading American healthcare company specializing in pharmaceutical distribution, health information technology, medical supplies, and healthcare management tools. Headquartered in Irving, Texas, McKesson is the largest healthcare company in the United States by revenue and delivers about one-third of all pharmaceuticals used in North America. The company is publicly traded on the NYSE under the ticker MCK and ranks ninth on the latest Fortune 500 list.
